Interface Build.Parameterized

Build
public static interface Build.Parameterized

Interface for handling command-line parameters

Method Summary
 int parameters(java.lang.String[] params)
          Handles build parameters.
 

Method Detail

parameters

int parameters(java.lang.String[] params)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Handles build parameters. It is invoked repeatedly with a sub-array of the remaining parameters, initially of length 1

Parameters:
params - An array of parameters
Returns:
0 if the parameter(s) have been handled, otherwise the required number to be re-invoked with
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
